ygData.subject: Yet more PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... LOL exactly! Reminds me camping Orcs in High Hold Pass! So all the people who leveled as fast as they could to get away from the over crowding issues are
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
> Ok, here's a good story that was relay'd over guildsay from someone
> who was there:
> tells the guild, 'seems the king room here in Sol-b has 2 groups - one
> that got pissed about the waiting list or something'
> tells the guild, 'now they are trying to KS from each other'
> tells the guild, 'hehe, they are calling in 'big guns' to nuke the
> doggies. there gotta be 15 ppl here now!'
> tells the guild, 'OMG! the ppl that were on the waiting list are here
> now and pissed off. they have formed a 3rd group and everyone is
> fighting for the room!'

LOL exactly! Reminds me camping Orcs in High Hold Pass!

So all the people who leveled as fast as they could to "get away" from
the over crowding issues are beginning to experience it all over again.

--
Kitsune Daiskoshi, Ranger of 33 seasons
Chortles Pyka, Bard of 21 seasons
Melancholy Diverted, Quellious Server
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Gwyn Carnegie, Systems Analyst gcarnegi@...
